Accurate Hand Cannon sight.

1926090094.name: Fastdraw HCS
1926090094.description:
Agile Hand Cannon sight.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability

1926090095.name: SteadyHand HCS
1926090095.description:
Stable Hand Cannon sight. 
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed

1927916065.name: Unplanned Reprieve
1927916065.description: Fusion projectiles attach and detonate with a delayed Void blast.

1941225610.name: Meganeura
1941225610.description: Dragonfly deals more damage based on the number of precision hits dealt to the target beforehand.

1954620775.name: Timed Payload
1954620775.description: Projectiles attached to enemies explode after a short delay.

1959648454.name: Default Ornament
1959648454.description: Restores your weapon to its default appearance.

1968497646.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
1968497646.description:
Rounds cause extra damage to combatants' shields and overpenetrate targets. 
  •  Slightly increases range

1992361643.name: Anti-Taken Fletching
1992361643.description:
Specialized to fight Taken targets.
  •  Increases accuracy

1996142143.name: Black Powder
1996142143.description:
This weapon's explosives are more effective.
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Decreases stability

2003108620.name: Thin the Herd
2003108620.description: Direct hits do more damage to enemy combatant shields. Rapid kills against grenade-damaged enemies refill the magazine. Kills always drop Primary ammo.

2010801679.name: Ambitious Assassin
2010801679.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.

2019952880.name: Serve the Colony
2019952880.description: Insectoid robot grenades quickly repopulate the magazine from reserves while the Colony is unequipped.

2039302152.name: Slideways
2039302152.description: Sliding partially reloads this weapon's magazine and temporarily boosts handling and stability.

2054312700.name: SC Holo
2054312700.description:
Häkke holo sights. Medium zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases range 
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed

2054312701.name: SD Thermal
2054312701.description:
Häkke thermal imaging scope. Medium-zoom. Highlights enemy targets. 
  •  Increases range

2057203855.name: Precision Frame
2057203855.description: Fires a long-range precision energy bolt. This weapon's recoil pattern is more predictably vertical.

2108556049.name: Lightweight Frame
2108556049.description: Recurve bow. Draw quickly and move faster while this weapon is equipped. Press  while drawn to cancel the shot.

2117683199.name: Full Auto Trigger System
2117683199.description: Holding down the trigger will fire this weapon at full auto.

2121086290.name: Rat Pack
2121086290.description: This fully automatic weapon becomes stronger when nearby allies also have it equipped. Stacks up to 6 times.

2130042297.name: Taken Predator
2130042297.description: Bonus damage against Taken enemies and Gambit invaders.
